dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach financial risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize caution and stability, avoiding high-risk investments to protect their assets.
Your FarTwin will take bold risks, seeking high potential returns but also higher likelihood of losses.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through images, videos, and visual aids, often retaining information more effectively.
Your FarTwin will learn primarily through sound, such as lectures, podcasts, or discussions.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly social, enjoying large gatherings and striking up conversations with ease.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter settings, valuing one-on-one interactions or small groups over large crowds.

dimensions.label: Technological Comfort
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will feel at ease with technology, using it to streamline their daily tasks and stay connected.
Your FarTwin may struggle with technology, finding it overwhelming or difficult to navigate.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will channel their creativity through visual arts, music, or other forms of self-expression.
Your FarTwin will express themselves through writing, such as stories, poetry, or journalism.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will carefully plan and schedule their day, ensuring a productive flow of tasks.
Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances, often going with the flow and adjusting their schedule accordingly.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach team work?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take charge, guiding their team towards a shared goal with clear direction.
Your FarTwin will work closely with others, valuing the input and contributions of their teammates to achieve a common objective.

dimensions.label: Risk in Personal Relationships
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin navigate personal relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach new relationships with care, assessing potential risks and benefits before committing.
Your FarTwin will be more willing to take calculated risks in their personal relationships, potentially leading to deeper connections.
